metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: SoX - Sound eXchange 14.4.2 and earlier is affected by: Out-of-bounds Read.The impact is: Denial of Service. The component is: read_samples functionat xa.c:219. The attack vector is: Victim must open specially crafted .xafile. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2017-18189.

criterions.comment: sox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
